弚字的基本解释

弚
tuí
“弟3”的讹字。

弚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dì］
［《廣韻》特計切，去霽，定。］
［《廣韻》徒禮切，上薺，定。］
(1)次第。
(2)称同父母、同父或同母而后生的男子，对兄而言。
(3)古代亦称妹为弟。
(4)泛称亲朋中同辈年幼于己的男子。唐杜甫有《王十五司马弟出郭相访遗营草堂貲》诗。
(5)在友朋中谦称自己。
(6)指门生、学生。
(7)幼，小。
(8)即使；假使。参见“弟令”。
(9)副词。姑且。
(10)副词。只；仅仅。
(11)第宅。今通作“第”。
(12)姓。宋有弟邦杰。见《宋史·王霆传》。
[②]［tì］
［《廣韻》徒禮切，上薺，定。］
通“悌1”。
顺从和敬爱兄长。
[③]［tuí］
［《集韻》徒回切，平灰，定。］
亦作“弚1”。
见“弟3靡”、“弟3佗”。

弚字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【弓字部】　弚； 康熙笔画：6； 页码：页357第05
【集韻】徒回切，音頹。弚靡，不窮貌。一曰遜伏。【莊子·應帝王】因以爲弚靡，因以爲波流。

考證：〔【集韻】徒回切，音頹。弚靡，困窮貌。〕　謹照原文困改不。
弚字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
弚字的起名意思

暂无。

Yi
Basic explanation of words
Yi
tuí
The corruption of "Brother 3".
Yi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dì］
["Guangyun" special plan to cut, go to Ji, set. ]
["Guangyun" only Liqie, upper water chestnut, set. ]
(1) The order.
(2) Men who are born from the same parents, father, or mother are referred to as brothers.
(3) In ancient times, sister was also called younger brother.
(4) Generally referred to as a man of his relatives and friends who are younger than himself. Tang Dufu has the poem "Wang Fifteen Sima Di Goes Out of Guo Xiang to Visit the Thatched Cottage".
(5) Call yourself modestly among friends.
(6) Refers to students and students.
(7) Young and small.
(8) Even if; if. See "Di Ling".
(9) Adverbs. tentatively.
(10) Adverbs. Only; only.
(11) The first house. This pass is the "first".
(12) Last name. Song has his brother Bangjie. See "Song History·Wang Ting Biography".
[②]［tì］
["Guangyun" only Liqie, upper water chestnut, set. ]
Same as "Ti 1".
Obedient and respect your brother.
[③] [tuí]
["Jiyun" cut back only, flat gray, fixed. ]
Also known as "弚1".
See "Brother 3 Mi" and "Brother 3 Tuo".
Yi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Jixia] [Bow Character Department] 　弚; Kangxi strokes: 6; Page number: page 357 05
[Jiyun] Cut back only, sound distressed. It's extravagant, not terrible. One said inferiorly. 【Zhuangzi·Emperor Ying】Because he thinks he is sluggish, because he thinks he is turbulent. Textual research: [[Jiyun] Cut back only, sound dispirited. Misty, poor appearance. 〕 　 I would like to change it according to the original text.
Yi
